conversation.content: I think I'm in the right place? Third transfer. About tips.
Oh no—third time? That's ridiculous. Let me—actually wait, let me pull up your account first. What's your guide ID?
It's it's TG-4429. Maybe TG-4428? No, 29. Definitely 29.
Got it, TG-4429. I see you're with City Explorer Tours, active since 2021, current rating 4.8 stars. Now tell me what's happening with the tips.
The app says I got tips. But they're not... they're not there?

Okay so—here's what I'm seeing. Your last three tour groups, dates 11/15, 11/16, and 11/17, show tip amounts of $45.00, $62.50, and $38.00 respectively. But you're saying those didn't hit your account?
That's exactly right. I mean, probably. Those sound like the right amounts.
You know what? I used to drive rideshare before this job, and the same thing happened to me once. Let me check your payout settings—account ending in 7739?
Seven seven... I think so? Or maybe 7779?
Actually I see two accounts here. Primary is Wells Fargo ending 7739, and there's an old Chase account ending 7779 that's still marked active. The tips went to the Chase one.
Chase? But I closed that. I sort of closed it. Maybe?
Yeah so—the bank shows it as open but restricted. The deposits bounced back to us on 11/20. Hold on, I'm gonna—no actually, we're fixing this right now.
Can you just... what do I need to do here?
Nothing. I'm pushing through a manual override, auth code MC-88291-X. The full amount, that's $145.50 total, will hit your Wells Fargo account within 2-3 hours.
Two to three hours? That's that's actually today?
Today. I'm also removing that Chase account from your profile completely, case number CS-20241122-8847 for your records. No more confusion.
I've been calling about this for... okay okay, you actually fixed it.
Listen, three transfers is insane. I'm adding a $25.00 service credit to your account too. You shouldn't have to explain this three times.
That's really... I mean, I just needed the tips but...
The tips are yours, you earned them. Credit's just because we wasted your time. Your new balance with the credit shows $170.50 pending. Should see it all really soon.

scenario: tour guide, friendly but exasperated after being transferred three times about a tip dispute
